content: p1 turn row 3 rs sl 1 k to 1 st before gap ssk k1 turn row 4 ws sl 1 p to 1 st before gap p2tog p1 turn repeat row 3 and 4 until all side stitches have been worked ending with a ws row 18 20 22 sts on heel do not turn catkitbob designs estuary032025v2 page 8 of 14 part 3 gusset and start of foot resume working in the round switch to chart c stitches 5-36 3-38 1-40 set-up round k across heel sts pm pick up and k1 st for every slipped st along heel flap pm work row 70 of chart c or written instructions pm pick up and k1 st for every slipped st along other side of heel flap pm next round k to marker sm k2tog k to marker sm work next row of chart c or written instructions sm k to 2 sts before marker ssk sm next round k to second marker slipping markers work next row of chart c or written instructions k to end slipping markers repeat last 2 row until you are back at your cast on stitch count of 64 72 80 sts remove markers and continue without decreases until all row of chart c or written instructions row 102 have been worked catkitbob designs estuary032025v2 page 9 of 14 part 3 written instructions - work once on each round round 70 set-up round k across heel sts pm pick up and k1 st for every slipped st along heel flap pm k tbl p1 x 1 2 3 1/1 lpt k tbl p1 k tbl 1/1 repeat p1 k5 p2 k5 p1 1/1 lpt k tbl p1 k tbl 1/1 repeat p1 k tbl x 1 2 3 pm pick up and k1 st for every slipped st along other side of heel flap pm round 71 k to marker sm k2tog k to marker sm k tbl p1 x 0 1 2 k tbl p2 1/1 lpt p1 1/1 repeat p2 k1 k2tog yo k2 p2 k2 yo ssk k1 p2 1/1 lpt p1 1/1 repeat p2 k tbl p1 k tbl x 0 1 2 sm k to 2 sts before marker ssk sm round 72 k to second marker slipping markers k tbl p1 × 0 1 2 k tbl p3 k tbl p1 k tbl p3 k5 p2 k5 p3 k tbl p1 k tbl p3 k tbl p1 k tbl x 0 1 2 k to end of round slipping markers round 73 k to marker sm k2tog k to marker sm k tbl p1 x 0 1 2 k tbl p3 1/1/1 lpt p3 k2tog yo k3 p2 k3 yo ssk p3 1/1/1 lpt p3 k tbl p1 k tbl x 0 1 2 sm k to 2 sts before marker ssk sm round 74 repeat round 72 round 75 k to marker sm k2tog k to marker sm k tbl p1 x 0 1 2 k
